entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023
